articles.content: More than 190 countries committed in 2015 to limiting global warming to 1.5 degrees Celsius (2.7 degrees Fahrenheit) above preindustrial levels in an effort to stave off the worst effects of climate … [+5670 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk Deletes Sexist Tweets - Futurism
articles.description: Several Musk's tweets appear to have crossed a line even for him — because, after an outcry, he deleted them, in a rare reversal for Musk.
articles.content:
"Thats a disgrace."
Pass/Fail
On Friday, Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk tweeted an idea for a new university with a vulgar name.
It was a crude outburst, even by the billionaires often-childish st… [+1713 chars]
